entity.name: entbase
entity.query: select m.ID, m.entName, m.regOrgName, m.regNo, m.leRep, nvl2(m.estDate,to_char(m.estDate,'YYYY-MM-DD')||'T00:00:00Z',null) as estDate, coalesce(m.Dom,m.OpLoc) as domOrOpLoc, m.regCap, (case when m.RegCap is null then null when m.RegCap < 10 then '1' when m.RegCap < 100 and m.RegCap >= 10 then '2' when m.RegCap < 1000 and m.RegCap >= 100 then '3' when m.RegCap >= 1000 then '4' end) as regCapLevel, m.regCapCurName, m.industryPhy, m.industryPhyName, m.opLocDistrict, m.entType, m.entTypeName from ICIS_MarPriPInfo m
entity.deltaImportQuery: select m.id, m.entName, m.regOrgName, m.regNo, m.leRep, nvl2(m.estDate,to_char(m.estDate,'YYYY-MM-DD')||'T00:00:00Z',null) as estDate, coalesce(m.Dom,m.OpLoc) as domOrOpLoc, m.regCap, (case when m.RegCap is null then null when m.RegCap < 10 then 1 when m.RegCap < 100 and m.RegCap >= 10 then 2 when m.RegCap < 1000 and m.RegCap >= 100 then 3 when m.RegCap >= 1000 then 4 end) as regCapLevel, m.regCapCurName, m.industryPhy, m.industryPhyName, m.opLocDistrict, m.entType, m.entTypeName from ICIS_MarPriPInfo m and m.ID='${dataimporter.delta.ID}'
entity.deltaQuery: select m.ID from ICIS_MarPriPInfo m where m.Timestamp > to_timestamp('${dataimporter.last_index_time}', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
